info.description: TON Index collects data from a full node to PostgreSQL database and provides convenient API to an indexed blockchain.
info.title: TON Index (Go)

get.description: Get vesting contracts by specified filters

parameters.description: Vesting contract address in any form. Max: 1000.
parameters.name: contract_address

parameters.description: Wallet address to filter by owner or sender. Max: 1000.
parameters.name: wallet_address

parameters.description: Check if wallet address is in whitelist.
parameters.name: check_whitelist

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
parameters.name: offset
